prompt_preview:
Analyze this codebase and identify concrete improvement opportunities.

For each category, list 5-15 specific, actionable items.
Be precise - reference specific files, line numbers, patterns.
Prioriti

response.content:
Based on the provided codebase excerpts and web search results, here are concrete improvement opportunities organized by category:

### MAJOR ARCHITECTURAL OPPORTUNITIES  

- **ID**: parallel_processing_optimization  
- **Description**: Implement automatic parallel processing optimization based on target file size for faster formatting  
- **Location**: [sorafujitani.me](https://sorafujitani.me/blog/building-rfmt-fast-ruby-formatter/)  
- **Effort**: medium  
- **Impact**: high  

- **ID**: parser_abstraction_layer  
- **Description**: Introduce a Bridge layer to abstract parser dependencies from the Emitter module  
- **Location**: [sorafujitani.me](https://sorafujitani.me/blog/building-rfmt-fast-ruby-formatter/)  
- **Effort**: medium  
- **Impact**: high  

- **ID**: dependency_injection_container  
- **Description**: Use dry-container + dry-auto_inject for cleaner dependency injection  
- **Location**: [lukin.io](https://lukin.io/blog/dry-rb-integration-rails-api)  
- **Effort**: large  
- **Impact**: high  

- **ID**: modularize_rubocop_rules  
- **Description**: Adopt rubocop-packs for gradually modularizing the codebase  
- **Location**: [github.com](https://github.com/rubyatscale/rubocop-packs)  
- **Effort**: medium  
- **Impact**: medium  

### MICRO-REFINEMENT OPPORTUNITIES  

- **ID**: avoid_boolean_equality_checks  
- **Description**: Remove redundant `== true` and `== false` checks in conditionals  
- **Location**: [github.com](https://github.com/eliotsykes/rails-code-review)  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: low  

- **ID**: enum_type_safety  
- **Description**: Replace manual enum validation with dry-types type-safe enums  
- **Location**: [lukin.io](https://lukin.io/blog/dry-rb-integration-rails-api)  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: medium  

- **ID**: memoize_constants  
- **Description**: Memoize frequently accessed configuration constants  
- **Location**: [lukin.io](https://lukin.io/blog/dry-rb-integration-rails-api)  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: medium  

- **ID**: rubocop_performance_cops  
- **Description**: Enable RuboCop performance cops to identify inefficiencies  
- **Location**: [github.com](https://github.com/rubocop/rubocop)  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: medium  

### CLI UI/UX OPPORTUNITIES  

- **ID**: progress_indicator  
- **Description**: Add a progress bar/spinner for long-running format operations  
- **Location**: [sorafujitani.me](https://sorafujitani.me/blog/building-rfmt-fast-ruby-formatter/)  
- **Effort**: medium  
- **Impact**: high  

- **ID**: colorized_output  
- **Description**: Use ANSI color codes to highlight success/error messages  
- **Location**: [github.com](https://github.com/rubocop/rubocop)  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: medium  

- **ID**: help_system  
- **Description**: Add detailed command help via `--help` flag  
- **Location**: throughout  
- **Effort**: medium  
- **Impact**: medium  

### TYPOGRAPHICAL OPPORTUNITIES  

- **ID**: smart_quotes
- **Description**: Replace straight quotes with curly quotes in documentation  
- **Location**: throughout  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: low  

- **ID**: em_dashes  
- **Description**: Use proper em dashes instead of hyphens for parenthetical remarks  
- **Location**: throughout  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: low  

- **ID**: consistent_bullets  
- **Description**: Standardize bullet point styles in Markdown files  
- **Location**: throughout  
- **Effort**: small  
- **Impact**: low  

The architectural opportunities likely offer the highest impact, particularly around performance and modularity. The CLI UX improvements can significantly enhance developer experience with relatively low effort. Micro-refinements and typographical changes provide incremental readability and maintainability benefits.
